activeGoals.description: Launch Lumensis publicly — target Feb 21 (next Friday). Full go-to-market strategy produced. 9-agency expert audit complete with 6 must-fix items.
activeGoals.notes: Feb 14 milestone: Launch strategy + expert synthesis + UX testing all complete. Six must-fix items before launch: identity labels, trust architecture, price consistency, shareable output, privacy disclosures, honest metric framing. Frontend is critical path (60-70% ready). Backend 95%. Martin said 'next week' — Feb 21 is the strategy doc's date.

activeGoals.description: Send outreach emails for Zurich visit (March 24-28). Priority contacts: Prof. Yanik (ETH Neurotechnology), Prof. Vollenweider (UZH Consciousness), Dr. Stocker (ETH Consciousness Studies), Anthropic Zurich, AI Safety Zurich
activeGoals.notes: 35+ organizations mapped in zurich-organizations-outreach.md. Trip after Vipassana (March 11-22).

activeGoals.description: Prepare condensed document for launch: user questions, methodologies, alternatives. Send to Nate for review.
activeGoals.notes: System architecture doc delivered Feb 13. Launch strategy doc produced Feb 14. May consolidate into a single Nate-facing document.

activeGoals.description: Apply 9-agency audit findings to product: identity labels, trust architecture, price consistency, shareable output, privacy disclosures, metric reframing
activeGoals.notes: Expert synthesis complete (77KB across 9 disciplines). Key insight: metrics have 2-5/10 validity, narratives have 8/10 value. Recommend reframing as 'conversational pattern exploration.' Identity labels are unanimous #1 priority across all 8 agencies.
